body_html:
@dchatterjee172
Thanks for submitting this feature request. Just to clarify:
The current operation does support multiple training points per batch but each data point is a 1-dim tensor. However, I could definitely see a scenario where each data point is a multi-dim tensor. For instance batch of 2-D images, in which case input tensor would be 3-D ([batch_size, i, j]). Is this the use case you have in mind?
